item.description:
We a going back to the OMNI and this time it be lighter longer and the bar, John Davenport's, is hooking us up with their Thursday Happy Hour specials. John Davenport's is on the top floor of the OMNI hotel so there is a fantastic view of New Haven Green and the surrounding area.

Please RSVP so the bar knows how many of us are coming and they are ready for us.


Drinks

$2 John Davenport's Atlantic Amber Draft

$5 Raspberry Martini and $5 Apple-tinis

$5 Glass of Chardonnay, Merlot or Cabernet


Apps

$2 English Cucumber Bites With Salmon Mousse

$3 Pineapple Chicken Teriyaki Kabobs

$2 Baked Brie Puff Pastry
item.name: Happy Hour at OMNI Hotel - Best View of New Haven
